Official: Analyze and Event Shops

5
Alastir
Tuesday, August 15th, 2017, 9:12:33 PM

It's now possible to ANALYZE inventory items at event shops (e.g. Duskruin, Ebon Gate, and other locations where you normally see items in the room and can interact with them before purchasing).

GameMaster Estild

http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/Game%20Design%20Discussions/Items%20and%20Inventory/view/2866
